First, writes the name of the car brand that you are looking for. Second, click on the search button to load the information about the car brand. Note: You can cancel downloading the information by clicking on Unload in the taskbar " You will have a list of the car make that belongs to the car brand that you decided. Third, lookup for the car that you are inserted in and then click and hold. Fourth, you will get and dialogue box, which contains the information about the car. Go to Favourites Do you want to delete this? SongsterAPI_View To search for your favourite artist or band songs type the name in the search bar and it will load the songs related to band or artist.You can also see the information by clicking on the and also add them to favourite list by pressing favourite button. By hitting the star next to search button it will load all your favourite songs.You can also remove the songs from your favourite list by long clicking them.
